attributes.action: Urge the United Nations to Militarily Intervene to Stop the Humanitarian Crisis In Zimbabwe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What is it going to take for the Free World to stand up and say enough is enough in Zimbabwe, and for the United Nations to stand together as representatives of the human race, and join together to remove Robert Mugabe by FORCE. Nations like the USA and Britain will readily send troops to Iraq who unsurprisingly have a huge wealth of oil. With Zimbabwe though, our government appears to be willing to make a few noises in the U.N., instead of doing what they did in Iraq and go it alone in removing a corrupt dictator for the good of humanity. Gordon Brown on behalf of ALL decent human beings ACT NOW.
